name: Lords and Tactics
description:
A Three Kingdoms war strategy game
Genre: SLG
Art Style: 2D
Release: Global
Languages: Multiple
The whole map has a total of 165 Cities, restoring the atmosphere of the Three Kingdoms with the real geographical relationship
Resource bonuses can be obtained by capturing the City, which means the City is the treasury. Resource points and wild monster points outside the City exist in the sandbox
Restore the ancient battle between the front, middle, and rear armies, which requires cavalry, infantry, and archer respectively.
The battle process is that the troops of both sides are closing. Then, the front, middle and rear troops attack in order in each round. Finally, the side that completely destroys the opponent wins.
Easy to play for the famous characters, which means it does not need extra education costs
Each character has unique skills and his skills generated from the history of the Three Kingdoms
Players' pursuit of various popular weapons, famous steeds, and treasures are truly restored and presented in the game. Also, the equipment of the characters can be freely weared
